attributes.action: put a bill to parliament making it law that neither parliament nor government can devolve soverignty outside of the UK (i.e. EU, UN), without a full national referendum.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to put a bill to parliament making it law that neither parliament nor government can devolve soverignty outside of the UK (i.e. EU, UN), without a full national referendum. A referendum which will clearly define the limits of the power the supra-national body will have over the United Kingdom. As it stands it is my view that the british people have no say over such matters as the EU, as all three major party's are in favor of it. All i ask for is a little democracy, somethng that our soldiers, sailors and airmen are fighting for throughout the owrld.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Roadreferendum/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
